CHAT.comment: JAMES WALKER, WARDEN, ET AL., Petitioners v. CHARLES W. MARTIN
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TODD MARSHALL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL B. BIGELOW ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF TODD MARSHALL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
